channel.title: Welcome to CantScript on CantScript
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to CantScript on CantScript

item.title: Automatically Updating VPP Apps
item.description: Keeping your VPP (Apps & Books) Apps up to date can be as simple as a check box in Jamf School but lets look at what to expect when using the Automatically Update Apps when Available Option

item.title: Using Jamf School Variables in Scripts
item.description: Jamf School allows for variable substitution all over the place, just not in Scripts! Learn how to deliver Jamf School variables to devices for use in Scripts

item.title: So...I decided to make a blog
item.description: Hello World! My first post and a chance to discover what I’m hoping this blog is all about
